SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.listeners

Interface GameListener

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Flow, GameListenerClient, GameListenerClientSocket
public interface GameListener extends Remote
GameListener is an interface for receiving game events from the server. All methods throw RemoteException as they are intended to be used in a remote RMI context.

  • Method Details

    • invalidNumPlayers

      void invalidNumPlayers() throws RemoteException
      Notifies that the number of players is invalid.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • playerJoined

      void playerJoined(ArrayList<String> players, String current, int num) throws RemoteException
      Notifies that a player has joined the game.
      Parameters:
      players - List of player names.
      current - The name of the current player.
      num - The number of players.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • hiddenGoalChoice

      void hiddenGoalChoice(ArrayList<GameCardView> cardViews, GameView gameView) throws RemoteException
      Prompts the player to choose a hidden goal card.
      Parameters:
      cardViews - List of game card views for the hidden goal choice.
      gameView - The current game view.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • sentMessage

      void sentMessage(String sender, String receiver, String message, String time) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to the players.
      Parameters:
      sender - The sender of the message.
      receiver - The receiver of the message.
      message - The content of the message.
      time - The time the message was sent.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
